page.title: 16Conversation Topics- July 85
page.content: There is much talk about{terrorism and its effects on people not directly involved in conflicts. The{American hostages}have been kept in Beirut,and the Irish Republicans have threatened to plant {bombs}at English sea side hotels.It is all much discussed but we feel remote from it here. Nationally there is much concern over{unemployment,}especially of the young, and over the{economy}and the stringencies imposed which cause cutailment of services to the public. We want ecomonies made, but often only where it does not adversly affect ourselves. The very cold and wet{weather}has made life difficult for growers. Teachers countrywide are in dispute over pay, some{schools closing}for 3 days.
